dimensions: Warp: 71 cm (28 in.). Weft: 94.5 cm (37 1/4 in.) Both selvedges present. Pattern: height of repeat not present. Enough of the textile is present to see that lengths would form a half-drop repeat if sewn together.
title: Combat de Trinquemale
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation
description: Sea battle with four ships engaged in combat. Parts of subsidiary, smaller scenes. In red on white.
